pages.title: Electric Vehicles
pages.content: Vehicles that run on electricity solely that use electric motors powered by rechargeable battery packs.

pages.title: Solar Energy
pages.content: Capture sunlight and convert it into daily electricity.

pages.title: Insulation and Appliances
pages.content: Efficient appliances and insulation cause less energy to be used and are more eco friendly.

pages.title: Passive Water Heating
pages.content: Use the ground to moderate the temperature of your house.
